label: In a hole in the ground..
subtitles: In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit.

label: Not a nasty, dirty..
subtitles: Not a nasty, dirty, wet hole, filled with the ends of worms and an oozy smell, nor yet a dry, bare, sandy hole with nothing in it to sit down on or to eat:

label: it was a hobbit-hole..
subtitles: it was a hobbit-hole, and that means comfort.
